title: Why does the moon look bigger when it's near the horizon?
itunes:title: Why does the moon look bigger when it's near the horizon?
description:
When the moon is near the horizon, it appears to be much bigger than when it's high in the sky. But is it really larger? Tune in to find out.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
